titlestmt.titleproper: Patco, Pat Lynn (UCLA 19--). Student records of courses in Home Economics and in Film and Radio departments.
Patco, Pat Lynn (UCLA 19--). Student records of courses in Home Economics and in Film and Radio departments. 1948-1949. UARC.0635

did.unittitle: Patco, Pat Lynn (UCLA 19--). Student records of courses in Home Economics and in Film and Radio departments.
did.abstract: Record Series 635 contains records of courses in home economics, film and radio offered by UCLA. These materials were collected and used by UCLA student Pat Lynn Patco (19--).

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: COLLECTION STORED OFF-SITE AT SRLF: Open for research. Advance notice required for access. Contact the UCLA Library Special Collections Reference Desk for paging information.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Copyright of portions of this collection has been assigned to The Regents of the University of California. The UCLA University Archives can grant permission to publish for materials to which it holds the copyright. All requests for permission to publish or quote must be submitted in writing to the UCLA University Archivist.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: We are committed to providing ethical, inclusive, and anti-racist description of the materials we steward, and to remediating existing description of our materials that contains language that may be offensive or cause harm. We invite you to submit feedback about how our collections are described, and how they could be described more accurately, by filling out the form located on our website: Report Potentially Offensive Description in Library Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Patco, Pat Lynn (UCLA 19--). Student records of courses in Home Economics and in Film and Radio departments (University Archives Record Series 635). UCLA Library Special Collections, University Archives.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Record Series 635 contains records of courses in home economics, film and radio offered by UCLA. These materials were collected and used by UCLA student Pat Lynn Patco (19--).
This is an inactive record series; no additional University records are expected to be added.

did.unittitle: Basic Film Techniques by Raymond Spottiswoode, UC Press, Berkeley & Los Angeles.
Home Economics 7 - lecture notes and lab work.
Federal Reserve Charts on Bank Credit, Money Rates, and Business. Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System. Washington, D.C.
A Glossary of Radio Terminology, by W. David Sievers, Radio Division Theater Arts Department, UCLA.
Economics 136A - book reports, examinations, and lecture notes.
